title: The Factor Monza Road Bike Promises Pro-Level Aero and Stiffness at a (More) Accessible Pricepoint
content:
Factor says its Monza is designed for riders who don't have a support car tailing them every ride. Does that make it a better bike?

Read the full article at The Factor Monza Road Bike Promises Pro-Level Aero and Stiffness at a (More) Accessible Pricepoint on Velo.
author: Alvin Holbrook
